summary: I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE I5 FREEWAY IN ORANGE COUNTY CA AROUND 6:45 PM DOING APPROXIMATELY 65-70 MPH, SUDDENLY MY TRUCK DOWNSHIFTED INTO FIRST GEAR CAUSING ME TO START FISH TAILING AND ALMOST FLIPPED OVER.  MY ENGINE THEN WENT INTO A FULL REV, REDLINING.  I WAS ABLE TO GET OVER TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD.  WHERE I HAD MY TRUCK TOWED TO THE DEALER.
